comments.creator: roc@ocallahan.org
comments.raw_text: We need to disable subpixel AA when we're rendering to a buffer that is going to be transformed before it reaches the screen. See attached testcase.
comments.text: We need to disable subpixel AA when we're rendering to a buffer that is going to be transformed before it reaches the screen. See attached testcase.
comments.author: roc@ocallahan.org

comments.creator: roc@ocallahan.org
comments.raw_text: Also, doing this will speed up rendering transforms containing text because we won't have to do component-alpha.
comments.text: Also, doing this will speed up rendering transforms containing text because we won't have to do component-alpha.
comments.author: roc@ocallahan.org
